    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game​(java.lang.String instructions,
            ImageList list)
        Creates a new Game with the provided data. Categories will be extracted from the ImageList provided. Instructions must be a non-null, non-blank string. List must contain at least 60 images wit a valid number of categories.
        Parameters:
        instructions - the instructions to show to the user for this Game
        list - the ImageList of all images to be used in this Game
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the provided data are not valid

      • Game

        public Game​(java.lang.String instructions,
            ImageList list,
            boolean require60)
        Creates a new Game with the provided data, declaring whether or not at least 60 images will be required. Categories will be extracted from the ImageList provided. Instructions must be a non-null, non-blank string. List must contain images wit a valid number of categories. Additionally, if require60 is true, the list must have at least 60 images.
        Parameters:
        instructions - the instructions to show to the user for this Game
        list - the ImageList of all images to be used in this Game
        require60 - true if this game should require at least 60 images in its ImageList, otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the provided data are not valid

      • Game

        public Game​(java.lang.String instructions,
            ImageList list,
            int correctIncrement,
            int incorrectDecrement)
        Creates a new Game with the provided data. Correct and Incorrect score adjustments passed will be saved. Categories will be extracted from the ImageList provided. Instructions must be a non-null, non-blank string. List must contain at least 60 images wit a valid number of categories.
        Parameters:
        instructions - the instructions to show to the user for this Game
        list - the ImageList of all images to be used in this Game
        correctIncrement - the amount to adjust game score by upon correct image categorization
        incorrectDecrement - the amount to adjust game score by upon incorrect image categorization
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the provided data are not valid

      • Game

        public Game​(java.lang.String instructions,
            ImageList list,
            int correctIncrement,
            int incorrectDecrement,
            boolean require60)
        Creates a new Game with the provided data, declaring whether or not at least 60 images will be required. Correct and Incorrect score adjustments passed will be saved. Categories will be extracted from the ImageList provided. Instructions must be a non-null, non-blank string. List must contain images wit a valid number of categories. Additionally, if require60 is true, the list must have at least 60 images.
        Parameters:
        instructions - the instructions to show to the user for this Game
        list - the ImageList of all images to be used in this Game
        correctIncrement - the amount to adjust game score by upon correct image categorization
        incorrectDecrement - the amount to adjust game score by upon incorrect image categorization
        require60 - true if this game should require at least 60 images in its ImageList, otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the provided data are not valid

      • Game

        public Game​(java.lang.String instructions,
            ImageList list,
            int correctIncrement,
            int incorrectDecrement,
            boolean require60,
            int time)
        Creates a new Game with the provided data, declaring whether or not at least 60 images will be required. Correct and Incorrect score adjustments passed will be saved. Categories will be extracted from the ImageList provided. Instructions must be a non-null, non-blank string. List must contain images wit a valid number of categories. Additionally, if require60 is true, the list must have at least 60 images. Time must be at least 1.
        Parameters:
        instructions - the instructions to show to the user for this Game
        list - the ImageList of all images to be used in this Game
        correctIncrement - the amount to adjust game score by upon correct image categorization
        incorrectDecrement - the amount to adjust game score by upon incorrect image categorization
        require60 - true if this game should require at least 60 images in its ImageList, otherwise false
        time - the amount of time in seconds that this game should be played for
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the provided data are not valid

    • Method Detail

      • getCategories

        public java.util.ArrayList<Category> getCategories()

      • getTime

        public int getTime()
        Returns the amount of time in seconds that this game should be played for.
        Returns:
        this game's time field

      • getInstructions

        public java.lang.String getInstructions()
        Simple getter for this Game's instructions
        Returns:
        the instructions field

      • getScore

        public int getScore()
        Simple getter for the user's score in this game.
        Returns:
        the score

      • getRequire60

        public boolean getRequire60()
        Retrieves whether this Game's ImageList must have 60 elements or not.
        Returns:
        true if the ImageList must be 60 elements or longer, false if that requirement is not active.

      • setCycle

        public void setCycle​(boolean assignment)
        Wrapper of ImageList's cycle setter. Sets whether a Game will cycle images.
        Parameters:
        assignment - true for each image may be reused after the first time through the list, false for each image is only used once

      • setRandomizeCycle

        public void setRandomizeCycle​(boolean assignment)
        Wrapper of ImageList's randomization setter. Sets whether a cycling game will randomize the image order between cycled.
        Parameters:
        assignment - true for randomized image order each cycle, false for same image order each cycle.

      • doesCycle

        public boolean doesCycle()
        Returns whether this Game cycles images after each one has been presented.
        Returns:
        true for cycling of images after complete runthrough of all images presented, false for each image will only be shown once and any future next image requests will throw exception.

      • doesRandomize

        public boolean doesRandomize()
        Returns whether this Game randomizes image order for each cycle.
        Returns:
        true for each cycle of images will have a different order, false for each cycle of images will have the same order.

      • available

        public int available()
        Gets how many images total are present in this Game.
        Returns:
        the number of images in this Game's ImageList.

      • remaining

        public int remaining()
        Gets how many images have not yet been shown in this Game.
        Returns:
        the number of images that have not yet been retreieved from this Game's ImageList.

      • scoreImage

        public int scoreImage​(ClassifiedImage image,
                      Category placement)
        Scores an image categorized by the user.
        Parameters:
        image - the image being scored
        placement - the category the user attempted to score the image as
        Returns:
        the new score

      • hasNext

        public boolean hasNext()
        Determines whether this Game has a next image that can be shown. This is true when either the internal ImageList has at least one element remaining, or the ImageList allows cycling.
        Returns:
        whether this Game has a next image.

      • nextImage

        public ClassifiedImage nextImage()
        Retrieves the next image to be shown to the user, and loads its BufferedImage into memory.
        Returns:
        a ClassifiedImage from the sequence of images with a loaded image
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this Game is out of images and not set to recycle images
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the next image could not be loaded into memory for some reason

      • nextStep

        public ClassifiedImage nextStep​(ClassifiedImage image,
                                Category placement)
        Scores the image provided and retrieves the next image to be shown. Combines usage of scoreImage() and nextImage(), and unloads the recently-scored image from memory.
        Parameters:
        image - the image that the user has just categorized
        placement - the Category that the user categorized the image as
        Returns:
        the next image in the sequence, a ClassifiedImage
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this Game is out of images and not set to recycle images
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the next image could not be loaded into memory for some reason
